summary:
All master perks except Dragon Armor only require a 90 with this mod enabled. To smooth the progression of Speech perks, it also sets Fence\'s requirement to 80. 

IMPORTANT: If you use \"I\'m a Hero, Not a Businessman\", put it below this in the load order.
descriptionHtml:
All master perks except Dragon Armor only require a 90 with this mod enabled. To smooth the progression of Speech perks, it also sets Fence\'s requirement to 80. 

IMPORTANT: If you use \"I\'m a Hero, Not a Businessman\", put it below this in the load order. 

This mod can also be found on Steam Workshop at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=133583400]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=133583400[/url].

If you find any bugs or issues, please note them in the comments so I can promptly address them.
author: David Sid
